page.title: 06PROVISION FOR UNDER-FIVES
page.content: THE CHILD HEALTH CLINICS ARE IN LISKEARD.THE HEALTH VISITORS THEREFORE WEIGH NEWBORN BABIES AT HOME. A MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP BEGAN IN 1981,AND MEETS WEEKLY IN THE METHODIST HALL.ITS MAIN AIM IS FRIENDSHP BETWEEN THE MOTHERS AND A GENTLE INTRODUCTION TO SHARING BETWEEN THE CHILDREN.IN 1985 A TINY TOTS GROUP BEGAN MEETING, AIMED MORE AT STIMULATING THE CHILDREN AS WELL AS ENABLING MOTHERS TO MEET.TO SOME DEGREE THE FIRST GROUP CATERS FOR MORE ESTABLISHED RESIDENTS,THE LATTER FOR NEWCOMERS. A PLAYGROUP MEETS 3 MORNINGS A WEEK, AGAIN IN THE METHODIST HALL. THIS IS OVERSUBSCRIBED.IT CATERS FOR CHILDREN IN TREVELMOND AND THE OUTLYING FARMS AS WELL AS DOBWALLS. THERE IS A PLAYING FIELD WITH 2 SWINGS AND A MONKEY BAR. THERE ARE NO WALKS WITHOUT GOING ALONG A ROAD.
